r.d: This extension provides a TDengine database driver for PDO. TDengine is a open-sourced time-series big data platform, designed and optimized for IoT, faster on insert/query speeds. This extension can be used to develop IoT projects with Swoole extension. This extension is compatible with PHP versions since 7.0.
r.n: Fixed bug when the subquery field value is empty. Fixed warnings when compiling with higher versions of gcc.
